message: Successfully crawled 8 pages from https://rwna.codestudio.my. The HTML content has been saved and should be analyzed to understand the website's structure, design patterns, navigation, content organization, and visual elements for creating a similar website.

Page 1: https://rwna.codestudio.my/clients
Summary: We take pride in our long-standing relationships with industry leaders in the global energy and engineering sectors. Our commitment to excellence has made us a trusted partner for multi-national corporations and regional powerhouses.Serving clients across Southeast Asia and beyond.Expertise spanning oil, gas, renewable energy, and marine.Built on trust, safety, and operational excellence.Our client portfolio includes some of the world's most demanding operators. Page 3: https://rwna.codestudio.my/about
Summary: Established in 2001, RWNA Engineering has evolved from a local pipeline contractor to a premier regional provider of integrated oil & gas engineering solutions.Established in 2001, serving the oil & gas industry.Over 2.5 million Lost Time Injury free hours achieved.Strategic locations across Malaysia for comprehensive coverage.ISO 9001:2015 certified since 2008 by Bureau Veritas.RWNA Engineering Sdn. Bhd. started its journey in 2001, focusing on sacrificial anode installation for subsea pipelines. Through unwavering commitment to quality and safety, we expanded our capabilities to include precision on-site machining, subsea cutting, and our signature W3P Enclosure Systems.Today, operating from our Innovation & Production Centre (IPC) in Gebeng, we serve major international energy companies, providing critical maintenance and construction support both onshore and offshore across Southeast Asia.To implement the best technical, operational and HSE practices in delivering services to our clients. We always strive to meet our clients' requirements as well as specifications at competitive prices.To continuously upgrade and leverage on the company's technical, operational, human resource, facilities, equipment, financial and management capabilities to meet future challenges and exceed expectations.To create a sustainable operation as a reliable oil and gas service provider.To Be a Respectable, Reliable and Credible Service Provider in the Oil and Gas Industry and Achieve Sustainable Growth Without Compromising HSE and Quality.To support our vision, we are inspired by these beliefs:We grow our staff's capabilities, creating a great working place and inspiring them to be the best they can be.We create a portfolio of oil and gas services by anticipating and satisfying our clients' needs.We go the extra mile to deliver and complete projects for our valued clients.We consistently strive to deliver cost effective, on time and comprehensive solutions utilizing the latest technology.Our state-of-the-art Innovation & Production Centre in Gebeng serves as the heart of our manufacturing capabilities. Equipped with advanced CNC machinery and precision tools, the IPC enables us to deliver custom engineering solutions with unmatched accuracy.Advanced CNC turning and milling capabilitiesCustom tool design and rapid prototypingMaterial testing and quality assurance laboratoryResearch & development for specialized oil & gas applicationsOur commitment to excellence is validated through internationally recognized certifications and rigorous compliance with industry standards, ensuring every project meets the highest quality and safety requirements.Quality Management SystemBody: BUREAU VERITASDate: 23/05/2008Occupational Health & Safety ManagementBody: BUREAU VERITASDate: 23/02/2019Occupational Health & Safety Assessment SeriesBody: BUREAU VERITASDate: 15/03/2016Pressure Vessel & Boiler Code CertificationBody: ASMEDate: 26/09/2014National Board Inspection Code AuthorizationBody: NATIONAL BOARDDate: 06/01/2015Repair Authorization for Pressure EquipmentBody: NATIONAL BOARDDate: 26/09/2014Uncompromising adherence to HSE standards to ensure zero accidents and a safe working environment.Precision engineering backed by ISO certifications and rigorous quality control processes.Building long-term relationships through integrity, transparency, and consistent performance.Specializing in on-site machining, subsea cutting, and safety enclosure systems. Delivering engineering excellence to the oil & gas industry since 2001.© 2026 RWNA Engineering Sdn. Bhd. (Co. Reg. No.: 200101003108). Page 6: https://rwna.codestudio.my/career
Summary: At RWNA, we don't just provide services; we build careers. Join a team of specialists dedicated to precision, safety, and innovation in the Oil & Gas industry.With over 2.5 million LTI-free hours, safety isn't just a policy at RWNA—it's our way of life. We provide our employees with state-of-the-art equipment and rigorous training to ensure they can perform at their best while staying safe.Our core values define how we work together and how we serve our clients.We uphold the highest standards of integrity in all our actions.We constantly seek smarter, safer ways to solve engineering challenges.We deliver high-quality engineering services that exceed expectations.We work as one team to achieve sustainable success for our clients.We invest in our people's well-being and growth because we know they are our greatest asset.Medical, dental, and insurance coverage for you and your family.Specialized technical training and certification programs in O&G.Work in an environment that prioritizes your safety above all else.Collaborate with experts from various engineering backgrounds.Ready to take the next step? Explore our current job opportunities and find your place at RWNA.6 POSITIONS AVAILABLEEnsure workplace safety and health compliance across all operationsLead and supervise on-site machining operationsProgram and operate advanced CNC machinery for precision manufacturingManage inventory and logistics operationsSupport engineering projects from planning to executionEnsure quality standards and compliance across all operationsWe're always looking for talented individuals. Send us your CV and we'll keep you in mind for future opportunities that match your expertise.Email your application to hr@rwna.com.mySpecializing in on-site machining, subsea cutting, and safety enclosure systems. Established in 2001, RWNA Engineering has evolved from a local pipeline contractor to a premier regional provider of integrated oil & gas engineering solutions.Established in 2001, serving the oil & gas industry.Over 2.5 million Lost Time Injury free hours achieved.Strategic locations across Malaysia for comprehensive coverage.ISO 9001:2015 certified since 2008 by Bureau Veritas.RWNA Engineering Sdn. Bhd. started its journey in 2001, focusing on sacrificial anode installation for subsea pipelines. Through unwavering commitment to quality and safety, we expanded our capabilities to include precision on-site machining, subsea cutting, and our signature W3P Enclosure Systems.Today, operating from our Innovation & Production Centre (IPC) in Gebeng, we serve major international energy companies, providing critical maintenance and construction support both onshore and offshore across Southeast Asia.To implement the best technical, operational and HSE practices in delivering services to our clients. We always strive to meet our clients' requirements as well as specifications at competitive prices.To continuously upgrade and leverage on the company's technical, operational, human resource, facilities, equipment, financial and management capabilities to meet future challenges and exceed expectations.To create a sustainable operation as a reliable oil and gas service provider.To Be a Respectable, Reliable and Credible Service Provider in the Oil and Gas Industry and Achieve Sustainable Growth Without Compromising HSE and Quality.To support our vision, we are inspired by these beliefs:We grow our staff's capabilities, creating a great working place and inspiring them to be the best they can be.We create a portfolio of oil and gas services by anticipating and satisfying our clients' needs.We go the extra mile to deliver and complete projects for our valued clients.We consistently strive to deliver cost effective, on time and comprehensive solutions utilizing the latest technology.Our state-of-the-art Innovation & Production Centre in Gebeng serves as the heart of our manufacturing capabilities. Equipped with advanced CNC machinery and precision tools, the IPC enables us to deliver custom engineering solutions with unmatched accuracy.Advanced CNC turning and milling capabilitiesCustom tool design and rapid prototypingMaterial testing and quality assurance laboratoryResearch & development for specialized oil & gas applicationsOur commitment to excellence is validated through internationally recognized certifications and rigorous compliance with industry standards, ensuring every project meets the highest quality and safety requirements.Quality Management SystemBody: BUREAU VERITASDate: 23/05/2008Occupational Health & Safety ManagementBody: BUREAU VERITASDate: 23/02/2019Occupational Health & Safety Assessment SeriesBody: BUREAU VERITASDate: 15/03/2016Pressure Vessel & Boiler Code CertificationBody: ASMEDate: 26/09/2014National Board Inspection Code AuthorizationBody: NATIONAL BOARDDate: 06/01/2015Repair Authorization for Pressure EquipmentBody: NATIONAL BOARDDate: 26/09/2014Uncompromising adherence to HSE standards to ensure zero accidents and a safe working environment.Precision engineering backed by ISO certifications and rigorous quality control processes.Building long-term relationships through integrity, transparency, and consistent performance.Specializing in on-site machining, subsea cutting, and safety enclosure systems.
